item.title: Opinion Poll by Peil.nl, 6 July 2024 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• DENK (*): 0 seats
  • Nieuw Sociaal Contract (EPP): 1–2 seats

  • Christen-Democratisch Appèl (EPP): 2–3 seats
  • GroenLinks (Greens/EFA): 3–4 seats
  • Partij van de Arbeid (S&D): 3 seats
